#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
inline int read ()
{
	char c;
	int n = 0;
 
	while ((c = getchar_unlocked ()) < 48);
	n += (c - '0');
 
	while ((c = getchar_unlocked ()) >= 48)
	  n = n * 10 + (c - '0');
 
	return n;
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,n;
    t=read();
    while(t--)
    { int sum=0;
        n=read();
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            sum+=i/2;
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
